column2: Several problems in NLP have lent themselves to

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-line-space

column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=5 left-column left-indent right-over indented-line longer-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: reported in this paper is a maximum entropy classi-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: fier (Berger et al., 1996; Ratnaparkhi, 1997b). Max-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line year headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: imum entropy is a general technique for estimating
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: probability distributions from data. A probability
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=6 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: distribution is derived from a set of events based on
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the computable qualities (characteristics) of these
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: events. The characteristics are called features, and
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: the events are sets of feature values.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=7 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-line-space

column2: If nothing about the data is known, estimating a
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-space headchar-capital

column2: probability distribution using the principle of max-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified hanged-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: imum entropy involves selecting the most uniform
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=8 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: distribution where all events have equal probability.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-period

column2: In other words, it means selecting the distribution
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-capital

column2: which maximises the entropy.
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column right-indent aligned-line shorter-tail headchar-lower tailchar-period above-line-space

column2: If data is available, a number of features extrac-
column3: page=2 xpos=0 ypos=9 left-column left-indent indented-line longer-tail line-space headchar-capital tailchar-hiphen column-bottom

column2: ted from the labeled training data are used to de-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified column-top headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: rive a set of constraints for the model. This set of
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=0 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: constraints characterises the class-specific expecta-
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column right-over aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column2: tions for the distribution. So, while the distribution
column3: page=2 xpos=5 ypos=1 right-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column2: 4.2 Smoothing: Gaussian Priors
column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=0 left-column right-indent aligned-line longer-tail line-double-space line-space numbered-heading2 above-line-space

column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=3 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower tailchar-hiphen

column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower

column3: page=3 xpos=0 ypos=4 left-column full-justified aligned-line headchar-lower
